short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Mode for Salesforce Commerce Cloud B2C!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you work in Salesforce commerce cloud B2C and your eyes are red in the end of the day? 

Although Salesforce has not the dark mode option , there is still a way to activate this feature. 

This mod allows you:

✔️to have your whole business manager in dark mode 
✔️to avoid eye pain 
✔️to work in the most readable theme with a pleasant color and lower contrast 
✔️to have the hover effects upgraded and not absent as in all other themes.
✔️increase your productivity and facilitate your workflow
